title: How Do I Deal With My Alcoholic Husband? - Part 1
description:
Debbie has asked her husband multiple times to go to AA, but since he hasn't, she's wondering what the next best step is for her daughter and herself? - Dr. Laura: “Nothing will improve until you show you are serious with a legal separation.”

Would you have the strength to follow a tough-love approach with your spouse? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com
